definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: The design of the planetary indexing cam mechanism is put forward for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次提出了一种行星分度凸轮机构的设计构想。

sentences.english: Cylinder sleeves, camshafts and piston pins can be coated with the new method.
sentences.chinese: 新涂层工艺适用于汽缸套，凸轮轴和活塞销。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a cam shaft straightener and belongs to the field of machinery.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种凸轮轴校直机，属机械领域。

sentences.english: Slides easily up the rope and jams when the cam is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 防坠器向上滑动自如，而向下受重时凸轮会制停。

sentences.english: A sort of chilled nodular iron camshaft was developed by adopting resin-coated sand shell mould casting process.
sentences.chinese: 开发了一种采用树脂砂壳型铸造的激冷球铁凸轮轴。

sentences.english: The cam member operably connects a temperature control knob to the thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮元件把一个温度控制旋钮可操作地连接于恒温器。

sentences.english: The effect of pouring temperature on the microstructure of chilled iron camshaft was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了浇注温度对激冷铸铁凸轮轴组织性能的影响。

sentences.english: The general image of a typical cam in a crack is shown below.
sentences.chinese: 下图是一个卡在岩缝中的凸轮。

sentences.english: Globoidal Cam Mechanism(GCM) was invented by C.
sentences.chinese: 弧面凸轮机构是由美国人C。

sentences.english: This pump design operates by means of an eccentric (an off-center section) on the engine camshaft.
sentences.chinese: 这种泵是由发动机凸轮轴上的偏心轮驱动。

sentences.english: The cam follower rides against a push rod, which pushes against a rocker arm.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮挺杆推动控制摇臂的推杆。

sentences.english: Finally, the example is given. The result can meet the requirements of picking-up.
sentences.chinese: 最后，进行了实例计算，所得凸轮曲线满足取标要求。

sentences.english: The holding-down and knock-over sinkers (5) do not require dedicated drives and box cams.
sentences.chinese: 退圈和脱圈沉降片不需要配给驱动装置和箱式凸轮。

sentences.english: This method has been applied to force sealed and groove sealed cam mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 本文将这种方法应用于力锁合凸轮和槽道凸轮。

sentences.english: This method has been applied to force sealed and groove sealed cam mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 本文将这种方法应用于力锁合凸轮和槽道凸轮。

sentences.english: Camshaft is one of the important parts on the automobile engine.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮轴是汽车发动机的重要零件。

definition: (of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
